snippet.title: Shadow Trick - WISHLIST ON STEAM!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010480/Shadow_Trick/

Play as a wizard and turn into a shadow to solve the puzzles and clear the level. Shadow Trick is a platformer game taking place in a magic castle with different biomes full of minions, traps, and boss fights. Keep an eye on your shadow and don't let your eyes trick you!

Features:
- Clever gameplay
- 30+ levels
- Boss fights
- 16-bit aesthetics
- Charming music tracks

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHZkLi-4lIASVlMP-Edq1jg/join
